title: Seedoo
description:
Seedoo is a free task-oriented habit tracker to reduce the stress, anxiety & overwhelm of daily life and build lasting habits more easily.

Seedoo reduces your mental load by showing you only what you need to do right now, allowing your brain to relax when you're up to date.

Seedoo transforms your life by helping you stay organized, build positive habits, and focus on what truly matters by providing personalized tools to reduce stress and stay motivated for greater productivity and success.
